name: @azure/keyvault-common
author: Microsoft Corporation
description: Common internal functionality for all of the Azure Key Vault clients in the Azure SDK for JavaScript

scripts.build: npm run extract-api && npm run build:es6 && npm run build:nodebrowser
scripts.execute:samples: npm run build:samples && npm run execute:js-samples && npm run execute:ts-samples
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test:node
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
